title: Rotating Game Modes
body:
GIve us what we all want god dam it! Whats with this months at a time without a change in game mode or none at all!! are they just lazy? following orders? BS. it sucks! Bring us Arurf/ Urf. Even aramUrf. Bring us all the fun game modes, maybe try to mix and match them on the different maps and for the love of League please keep giving us something else to play in this stagnant game. Maybe ohh idk, have a set plan voted by its players on game modes to rotate every now and then. No down time! idk idc just give the people what they  want. what i want XD

p.s Happy Holidays & Happy New Year!

replies.body: I Just want to see URF (ARURF) more than once a year T-T
I Just want to see URF (ARURF) more than once a year T-T
